author: mrglavas
msg: Build infrastructure for XML Schema 1.1. Thanks to Ankit Pasricha.

author: mrglavas
msg: Initial support for XML Schema 1.1. Adding datatype validators
for the two new duration types as well as some interfaces for
actual values: List, Double, Float, HexBinary, Base64. Thanks
to Ankit Pasricha for this contribution.

author: mrglavas
msg: Adding support for computing character offsets to the scanner.
Exposing this information to the XNI and DOM locators. Thanks
to Ankit Pasricha for this contribution.
